A single valiant hero, alone in a vast forest.

What is that thing to the left, you say? Well, I shall tell you a story that has been passed down through generations. It is a house. They are locked by default, but once you acquire a mystical key item, you can gain access to them. Once inside, you have the ability to save the progress of your game using the ominous checkpoint flag and store items such as apples or pumpkins in a magically teleporting chest.
